code:
---
title: Security Incident Response - AtlasMesh Fleet OS
---
sequenceDiagram
    participant VA as Vehicle Agent
    participant ZT as Zero-Trust IAM
    participant SM as Security Monitor
    participant IR as Incident Response
    participant PE as Policy Engine
    participant KS as Key/Secret Management
    participant AL as Audit Log
    participant OC as On-Call Team
    
    Note over VA,OC: Security Incident Detection & Response
    
    %% Anomaly Detection
    VA->>+ZT: AuthenticateRequest(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    ZT->>ZT: Validate certificate and permissions
    ZT->>+SM: LogAuthenticationAttempt(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    SM->>SM: Analyze authentication patterns
    
    alt Suspicious Activity Detected
        SM->>SM: Correlate with threat intelligence
        SM->>+IR: TriggerSecurityAlert(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        IR->>IR: Classify incident severity
        IR->>AL: Log security incident
        
        %% Immediate Response
        alt High Severity Incident
            IR->>+PE: EvaluatePolicy(FinTech_AuthVault)
            PE->>PE: Execute emergency security policies
            PE->>AL: Log emergency policy activation
            PE->>-IR: PolicyResult(FinTech_FraudDetection)
            
            IR->>+ZT: RevokeVehicleAccess(FinTech_AuthVault)
            ZT->>ZT: Revoke all active tokens
            ZT->>AL: Log access revocation
            ZT->>-IR: AccessRevoked(FinTech_FraudDetection)
            
            IR->>+KS: RotateVehicleSecrets(FinTech_AuthVault)
            KS->>KS: Generate new certificates immediately
            KS->>AL: Log emergency secret rotation
            KS->>-IR: SecretsRotated(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
            
            IR->>+OC: PageOnCallTeam(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
            OC->>-IR: IncidentAcknowledged(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
            
        else Medium/Low Severity
            IR->>+PE: EvaluatePolicy(FinTech_LedgerService)
            PE->>-IR: PolicyResult(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
            
            IR->>+SM: EnhanceMonitoring(FinTech_LedgerService)
            SM->>-IR: MonitoringEnhanced(FinTech_AuthVault)
            
            IR->>+OC: NotifySecurityTeam(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
            OC->>-IR: NotificationReceived(FinTech_AuthVault)
        end
        
        %% Investigation & Remediation
        IR->>IR: Begin incident investigation
        IR->>+AL: CollectForensicEvidence(FinTech_LedgerService)
        AL->>AL: Generate forensic timeline
        AL->>-IR: ForensicEvidence(FinTech_LedgerService)
        
        IR->>+VA: RequestDiagnosticData(FinTech_LedgerService)
        VA->>VA: Collect detailed system state
        VA->>-IR: DiagnosticData(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        
        %% Recovery Process
        alt Incident Contained
            IR->>+ZT: RestoreVehicleAccess(FinTech_FraudDetection)
            ZT->>ZT: Validate new identity
            ZT->>AL: Log access restoration
            ZT->>-IR: AccessRestored(FinTech_LedgerService)
            
            IR->>+VA: NotifySecurityClearance(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
            VA->>VA: Resume normal operations
            VA->>AL: Log security clearance
            VA->>-IR: OperationsResumed(FinTech_LedgerService)
            
        else Incident Escalated
            IR->>+OC: EscalateIncident(FinTech_AuthVault)
            OC->>OC: Engage security experts
            OC->>-IR: IncidentEscalated(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        end
        
        %% Post-Incident Activities
        IR->>IR: Generate incident report
        IR->>+AL: ArchiveIncidentEvidence(FinTech_LedgerService)
        AL->>-IR: EvidenceArchived(FinTech_FraudDetection)
        
        IR->>+PE: UpdateSecurityPolicies(FinTech_AuthVault)
        PE->>PE: Incorporate security improvements
        PE->>AL: Log policy updates
        PE->>-IR: PoliciesUpdated(FinTech_FraudDetection)
        
    else Normal Activity
        ZT->>-VA: AuthenticationSuccess(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
        SM->>-ZT: ActivityLogged(FinTech_LedgerService)
    end

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_PaymentGateway 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_PaymentGateway'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_AuthVault'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。

这里必须包含 FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_AuthVault 这一块。
